name: RogueLoot
description:
RogueLoot is an inventory-based RPG I made using Godot for the #godotwildjam

This game is mainly just an experiment. There is very little polish and some bugs here and there. I wanted to test the idea and see how it felt at a basic level. I'm happy with the prototype.

Music by my brother Caleb Anderson :)

WARNING: The volume is really loud so beware.
